name: WP Easy Notices
author: Nate Conley

sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload wp-easy-notices.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Enable and configure notices from the WP Customizer!
sections.faq:
How are dismissals logged?

Dismissals are logged using localStorage. You can clear dismissals right from the Customizer.

Help, I need a hook!

Feel free to reach out and I will see if I can accommodate your request!
sections.description: WP Easy Notices adds a simple notice bar to your site to display information to your visitors! Easily add notices and configure them right from the WordPress Customizer. Notices can also dismissable, and will stay hidden for users whether they are logged in or not. If you change your notice, simply clear dismissals and all users will see your notice again!
